item.title: CAN knowledge
item.description: CAN knowledge CAN: From physical layer to application layer and beyond Figure 1: In general, CAN-based communication is described by means of the 7-layer OSI model The CAN knowledge pages provide technical information on all three CAN (Controller Area Network) data link layer generations: Classical CAN CAN FD CAN XL CAN FD Light The CAN knowledge pages also describes several CAN physical layer options. Additionally, these pages also contain technical

item.title: CAN 总线的前世今生
item.description: CAN总线35周年特别篇 – CAN总线的前世今生 本文整理翻译自 CAN in Automation（CiA），通过这个帖子大家会对当前市场上各种 CAN 名词有个
